Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, In case you have been too busy to stop by the GC, don’t miss out on some hot cloud content! Join the Green Circle’s March Madness Bracket Challenge! <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/3353-autonomic-bracketology-march-madness-2017]]> For the first time, we’re hosting a bracket competition for this year’s March Madness. Sign up & submit your brackets before Thursday, March 16th to be eligible to win 1000 GC points! Good luck!
Do you know your way through the AWS service jungle? <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4332-aws-services]]> Read about AWS's current offerings for services, including a brief description of what the service does, and how one might use the service.
Did you know we have an updated API? <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4273-new-rest-api?sr=search&searchId=6a362517-6fe7-4d0f-b209-83a74988cb5f&searchIndex=0]]> Learn more about the numerous enhancements such as JSON response, dynamic documentation and full feature parity with the new user interface.
Are You Planning for Specific Growth? <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/3325]]> Do you use Turbonomic to measure your expected hardware expansion given the growth scenario? If not, read more here
Updating directly to 5.7 from 5.5? <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/3322]]> We suggest SSHing into your Turbonomic instance and then running a few commands.
Are memory resize recommendations tied to VM memory? <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/3341-are-acm-sql-dbmem-resize-recommendations-tied-to-vm-memory]]> If an SQL application needs more memory, is the resize recommendation limited by the amount of memory on the VM? Join the discussion! - The Green Circle Team
